SQL.LOAD: SELECT dealerfile_processed_id, record_type, reject_code, reject_reason, tmk_loaded, certificate, dealercode, firstname, lastname, salesdate, campaign_number, layout, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, dealer_tmk_recon_wrk_id FROM elp_dealer_tmk_recon_wrk WHERE dealer_tmk_recon_wrk_id = :dealer_tmk_recon_wrk_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT dtrw.dealer_tmk_recon_wrk_id, dtrw.dealerfile_processed_id, dtrw.record_type, dtrw.reject_code, dtrw.reject_reason, dtrw.tmk_loaded, dtrw.certificate, dtrw.dealercode, dtrw.firstname, dtrw.lastname, to_Char(dtrw.salesdate, 'dd-Mon-yyyy') salesdate, dtrw.campaign_number, dtrw.layout, dtrw.modified_date, (SELECT t.translation FROM elp_dict_item_translation t WHERE dict_item_id = (SELECT dict_item_id FROM elp_list_item WHERE list_id=(SELECT list_id FROM elp_list WHERE code = 'TMKSTATUS') AND code = dtrw.tmk_loaded) AND t.language_id = :language_id) tmk_loaded_desc FROM elp_dealer_tmk_recon_wrk dtrw WHERE dealerfile_processed_id = :dealerfile_processed_id --dynamic_where_clause order by reject_reason
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_dealer_tmk_recon_wrk SET dealerfile_processed_id = :dealerfile_processed_id, record_type = :record_type, reject_code = :reject_code, reject_reason = :reject_reason, tmk_loaded = :tmk_loaded, certificate = :certificate, dealercode = :dealercode, firstname = :firstname, lastname = :lastname, salesdate = :salesdate, campaign_number = :campaign_number, layout = :layout, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE dealer_tmk_recon_wrk_id = :dealer_tmk_recon_wrk_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_dealer_tmk_recon_wrk ( dealerfile_processed_id, record_type, reject_code, reject_reason, tmk_loaded, certificate, dealercode, firstname, lastname, salesdate, campaign_number, layout, created_by, dealer_tmk_recon_wrk_id ) VALUES ( :dealerfile_processed_id, :record_type, :reject_code, :reject_reason, :tmk_loaded, :certificate, :dealercode, :firstname, :lastname, :salesdate, :campaign_number, :layout, :created_by, :dealer_tmk_recon_wrk_id )
